description: This file defines a function to fetch upcoming SpaceX launches from an external API, creates an agent with a specific model and context, and initiates a response to a user prompt about upcoming SpaceX missions.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an AI agent capable of processing context and generating responses.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A class representing an OpenAI chat model configuration.

methods.name: get_upcoming_spacex_launches
methods.description: Fetches and returns a JSON-formatted string of upcoming SpaceX launches, limited by the specified number.
